page.title: 10BLAGDON LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content: Every Wednesday we go to{youth club which is held at the school hall.We play on our BMX bikes and also on the snooker table.Sometimes we play table tennis. In Blagdon we have also built{a BMX {track}which is a favorite with the boys.Along with two tennis courts we have swings and a football and rugby pitch. Every Thursday evening,quite a few girls go to{Guides}which is held at the Methodist hall.{Dancing lessons are also held in the Methodist hall, including Ballet,tap dancing and keep fit for adults. Up on the Mendips,there are a few seats which have been placed where you can sit and see spectacular views of Blagdon and the lake. On a fine day you can see the sea at{Weston Super {Mare,}and even the{South Wales coast.
